title: Legends of Kaiatan
description: You think you know the stories…12 Dancing Princesses, Snow White, Red Riding Hood, The Frog, The Stonecutter, and more…But what if they didn’t happen that way?What if they really occurred on another world and the truth was lost in the mists of time?From the world of Unexpected Heroes, read the true Legends of Kaiatan.
author: Marty C. Lee
